name: Guinsoo's Rageblade
tooltip:
Guinsoo's Rageblade

Cost: 2800
+40% Attack Speed
+20% Critical Hit Chance

UNIQUE Passive - Wrath: Deal 2 bonus physical damage on-hit for every 1% critical strike chance, up to 200 bonus physical damage on-hit at 100% critical strike chance, but you can no longer critically strike.

UNIQUE Passive - Seething Strike: Basic attacks on-attack grant a stack for 6 seconds, up to 2 stacks. At 2 stacks, the next basic attack on-attack consumes all stacks to trigger a Phantom Hit that applies on-hit effects to the target after a 0.15 second delay.
